Hello!
Thank you for contacting Retool Customer Support! The ticket number for your message is {{{Case.CaseNumber}}}. This inbox is focused on account and billing issues, and we aim to respond within 1-2 business days.
If you are looking for Enterprise plans that include dedicated support resources, book some time with our team here < https://retool.com/demo?meeting_page_source=support_auto_reply > . If you are already on the Enterprise plan, please reply and let us know!
For technical guidance, bug reports, and feature requests, please visit our Developer Community Forum < https://community.retool.com/t/welcome-to-the-retool-community > where our community experts and Retool Community Engineers provide hundreds of solutions weekly. If there isn't already a helpful answer for your question, we want there to be one, so please sign up < https://community.retool.com/signup > or log in < https://community.retool.com/login > and ask! Ensure your posts get timely engagement by including:
- A detailed title and clear description - Screenshots, recordings, or code snippets (e.g., browser console, logs, error messages) - Example < https://retool.file.force.com/email/templaterenderer?id=00XQo000002Ye6j&base_href=https%253A%252F%252Fretool.my.salesforce.com&preview_frame=previewFrame&render_type=REPLACED_HTML_BODY&setupid=CommunicationTemplatesEmail > topic with good inputs that received swift responses
In addition to our forums and our docs < https://docs.retool.com/ > , take a look at these additional resources:
- Account, billing, and user permissions FAQs: Cloud FAQ < https://community.retool.com/t/accounts-users-and-billing-faq/29043 > , Self-Hosted FAQ < https://community.retool.com/t/self-hosted-account-billing-faq/38653 > - Performance issues, lining or other app errors? Inspect debug tools < https://docs.retool.com/apps/concepts/debug-tools > for clues to get unblocked. - We offer live video office hours < https://community.retool.com/t/come-join-retool-office-hours-now-in-discord/12348 > hosted on Discord several times per week. Thank you for understanding and for being a part of the Retool community!
Sincerely,
The Retool Support Team
